ABOUT

Personal Info

Hello

My name is Charles Loehle and I am a passionate frontend web developer using web technologies to solve problems for various industries. I currently use HTML5, CSS3, Javascript, ReactJS, Sass, Git, Github and Adobe XD

Skills

PROJECTS

Latest Projects

WordPress Restaurant Theme

Wordpress restaurant theme. PHP, SCSS, Javascript, Custom post types with register_post_type (no plugin) and WP_Query, Advanced Custom Fields plugin to create the menu and related locations/events, @wordpress/scripts to compile javascript and scss.

SEE LIVE SEE CODE

Recipe Finder

Find a recipe for a deliciious meal. Search by ingredient and add to favorites. Click on the recipe for nutritional facts, then go to the instructions site and make your meal. Built with Edamam's recipe search API, NextJS (ReactJS), SASS and original design. Favorites are saved in the browser's local storage.

SEE LIVE SEE CODE

Music Lesson Tracker

An app to help music teachers manage their lesson studios. Save student contact information. Track lesson dates and times, lesson homework and attendance. MERN stack: MongoDB, ExpressJS, ReactJS, NodeJS, Bootstrap and custom CSS and design.

SEE LIVE SEE CODE

Weather App

Local weather app using Openweathermap api. Designed in Adobe XD, coded with Javascript, CSS and HTML.

SEE LIVE SEE CODE

Blogr

A project from frontendmentor.io. A responsive layout with mobile menu that has dropdown links and an animated hamburger and menu that fades in. Using Javascript, SASS and HTML.

Wordpress Portfolio Theme

First iteration of my portfolio site in a Wordpress theme. Designed by me and coded in PHP, SASS, JQuery, Javascript.

A sign up form from project from frontendmentor.io with javascript user input validation. Made with HTML, CSS and Javascript.
